topics.body:
Well I just read the dumbest fucking comment ever of all time.

Apparently there's a internet movement going on to ask x-men's creators to turn Magnetto African American saying that x-men lacks diversity.

Reasons why that's so idiotic summarized:
1)Magnetto is Jewish and was in a nazi concentration camp
2)There are tons of minorities in x-men
3)You can't even try the bullshit redirection of going "well why aren't there more women?"/"well why aren't there more gays?" cause there's a disproportionately higher percentage of minority groups than there are in the general populace; aren't northstar, iceman gay?  Wait; isn't Mystique bisexual?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557890246368725d6b000067#post_557890246368725d6b000067
How to be internet financially successful:

Step 1)Say something along the lines of "Gay men not finding women sexually attractive is vaginaphobic and misogynistic!" (That's not a joke about people believing this, but tumblr actually does believe this)
Step 2)Whenever people call you out change the requirements for the discussion and claim that you were right all along.
Step 3)If that fails use political affiliation as a insult to "defend yourself".
Step 4)Dox them
Step 5)Beg for patreon donations
Step 6)Profit
